attributes.action: take part in a live televised debate with the leaders of the other political parties at the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to engage with the people we feel that the PM should participate in a televised debate with the leaders of the other political parties.

Political hustings have long been a part of British democracy, and we feel that it is only fair and reasonable that the PM acknowledges that by taking part in a live hustings.

If anything else, it gives the electorate the chance to see their possible future leaders in action, arguing their case, and this can only help decrease political apathy. This will strengthen democracy.
